IX.iii.1.D.2.i
.
Exclusion of Income From the Operation of a Business
Expenses excluded to arrive at income from rentals, business, or a profession under
38 CFR 3.262(a)(2)
are not entered as deductible.  Enter the net business income.
Note
:  Depreciation is not a deductible business expense for VA, although it is for the IRS.
